## CategoryResult interface

A collection of CategoryTree objects and pagination information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CategoryResult 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [items?](./magento-api.categoryresult.items.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[CategoryTree](./magento-api.categorytree.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A list of categories that match the filter criteria. |
